::Dark Prime-->Optimus Prime::

    He had been wandering for days, not car=
ing if he returned to Nod. Suddenly he got a feeling that something wasn't =
right in the Universe. There were too many evils, and and age old riverly c=
ould not be brought to a close.
    Galvatron was alive. Optimus Prime was =
stuck within the Evilness of Dark Prime. They would not be able to fight bo=
th being evil. Primus needed to be sated.
    The Time Gateway (remember th=
at?) Glowed with a firey reddness. The source of Prime's evil and his lust =
for the power of Cronus was seated there. The Gateway exploded, shattering =
into thousands of peices.
    Dark Prime fell to his knees. His body was wr=
acked with pain. His chest panel opened of it's own will (well, not really)=
 and the Autobot Matrix emerged. It floated out from Prime's chest and then=
 it opened. Releasing all of Prime's goodness back into him, but leaving ju=
st enough evil to get the job done. Prime's body went through a change as w=
ell, from his knees to his feet became Blue, his upper legs became white, h=
is arms and chest became the familiar Prime Red. His mouth plate became sil=
ver, along with much of his face, the helmet that surrounded it bacame blue=
, his hands also became Blue.
    As the Matrix went back into his chest a =
giant light emitted from him, it covered the entire planet (got permission)=
 everything on the planet saw this light.
    A voice boomed over the plane=
t, all bots could hear this as well, no matter where they were. The voice s=
aid, "Arise, Optimus Prime."
    Dark Prime had died, Optimus Prime was reb=
orn, with a new drive.

(Please add Dark Prime to the Matrix)
